tags.name: pzsh-banner
tags.description:
Component that might contain the search or the navigation, part of
the header below the topbar.

tags.name: pzsh-container
tags.description:
Full height container component that expects to be "slotted" with
header, content and footer.

slots.description: Add header, content and footer in this slot.

tags.name: pzsh-header
tags.description:
Component for the application's header, contains the topbar and the
banner.

slots.name: logo
slots.description: Slot for the topbar logo SVG graphic

tags.name: pzsh-topbar
tags.description:
Top application bar that contains logo and optional
application-wide actions like help, logout etc.

slots.name: logo
slots.description: Slot for the logo SVG graphic
